UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Synthesis and characterization of an antibacterial and non-toxic dimeric peptide derived from the C-terminal region of Bothropstoxin-I.
Literature.Author: Santos-Filho NA, Lorenzón EN, Ramos MA, Santos CT, Piccoli JP, Bauab TM, Fusco-Almeida AM, Cilli EM

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=128µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=>128µM),Candida albicans ATCC 18804(MIC=>128µM)
